summary: Completed backend testing (100% success) and partial frontend testing. Critical ReactQuill compatibility issues prevent recipe creation functionality

ui_bugs.issue: react-dom l.default.findDOMNode is not a function - ReactQuill compatibility error
ui_bugs.impact: App crashes with red error screen, prevents recipe creation

integration_issues.issue: Unable to test recipe creation due to ReactQuill component failure

passed_tests: Recipe CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Initial app loading and basic navigation
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix ReactQuill compatibility issues - likely React version mismatch. The react-dom findDOMNode error suggests ReactQuill is incompatible with current React version. Consider updating ReactQuill to latest version or replacing with a compatible rich text editor
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 30% (critical component failure)
